entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
